subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN1935, how did it go?
description_text:
On Tue, Jul 29, 2025 at 4:10 PM SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:Hello I
like how persistent you guys are on requesting reviews. It shows that you
definitely listen to the customers that being said I’m very happy with my
product a few minor complaints just on simple squeaking when brake is
applied and my gas pedal is a little choppy not so smooth when pressing it
almost feels like it needs lubricant of sort it could have to do with the
fact that I shortened the throw but other than that, the pedals have been
phenomenal and the configurability on the Simsonn software is fantastic!!

> Hello Timothy, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and
> feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only
> takes a few
> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
>
> Hello Timothy,
>
> We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review
> helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few
> seconds.

conversations.body_text: Hi Timmy Janik,    Thank you for your feedback! Could the brake noise be caused by the mount not being securely fastened? Could you please provide a video so we can analyze it further?  Regarding the throttle, some plastic components require periodic lubrication, which will make it much smoother. We used to include W40 lubricant with the product, but due to varying customs regulations in different countries, it often caused unnecessary returns and inspections. For this reason, we discontinued including it and also cannot pre-lubricate the parts, as it might trigger customs inspections.

Good to know, unfortunately I just tried to adjust the throw on my clutch
pedal to make it shorter and more realistic and to my surprise a plastic
piece fell out and now it no longer works

On Tue, Jul 29, 2025 at 9:18 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Timmy Janik,  We will send you a replacement clutch pedal. Adjusting the travel to its minimum limit may have caused the sensor plate to hit the blue stopper and break. Today, we will send you an upgraded clutch pedal as a replacement.

Thank you very much that was a very quick response and I appreciate the
care and understanding and won’t be adjusting it that far again lol I can
send the old one back if you like?Also do you need a shipping address or do
you have the one for the original order?

On Thu, Jul 31, 2025 at 8:01 PM service@simsonn.com

Hello I was just wondering the status of the pedal upgrade shipping? Thank
you again for the help and understanding
Hi Timmy Janik,    Here is your logistics tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045838287715
